info.name: Agenda bot
info.summary: 🤖 Transform your Talk meetings with intelligent agenda management, real-time time tracking, and automated progress monitoring!
info.description:
### 🚀 Meeting Manager for Nextcloud Talk
Tired of unproductive meetings that run overtime? The Agenda Bot transforms chaotic discussions into structured, efficient sessions with intelligent automation and real-time insights. **⚠️ Requires Nextcloud Talk app to be installed and enabled**
### ✨ Key Features
#### 🎯 Effortless Agenda Creation - Natural language: `agenda: Project review (15 min)` - Multiple formats: `topic:`, `item:`, `add:`, `insert:` - Create multiple items at once from structured lists - Smart time parsing: `(5 min)`, `(1h)`, `(90 min)`, `(2 hours)` - Automatic positioning or manual `#2.` syntax
#### ⏰ Intelligent Time Management - Background monitoring tracks time automatically - Smart warnings at 80%, 100%, and overtime thresholds - Call-aware notifications (only during active meetings) - Custom time monitoring configuration per room - Visual progress tracking with ✅ 📍 🗣️ indicators
#### 🔥 Seamless Meeting Flow - **`done:` command** - Complete current item and auto-advance! - Real-time status shows actual vs. planned time - Automatic progression through agenda items - Live updates for all participants
#### ⚙️ Room-Level Bot Configuration (NEW in v1.4.0!) - **Time Monitoring**: Custom warning thresholds and overtime alerts per room - **Auto-behaviors**: Control automatic start, cleanup, and summary generation - **Response-behaviors**: Choose between full responses or minimal emoji-only mode - **Agenda Limits**: Configure max agenda items, max bulk additions, and default durations - **Custom Emojis**: Personalize agenda item status indicators
#### 🔐 Smart Permission System - Role-based access: Owners, Moderators, Users, Guests - Flexible control: Who can add, manage, or view items - Guest moderator support for external facilitators
#### 📊 Meeting Analytics & Insights - Completion tracking with timing statistics - Efficiency reports: On-time 👍 vs. overtime ⏰ - Comprehensive summaries with actionable data - Optional cleanup of completed items
### 💫 Why Using Agenda Bot?
- ✅ **Boost Productivity** - Stay focused with structured agendas - ✅ **Save Time** - Automated tracking and progress management - ✅ **Improve Accountability** - Clear completion tracking - ✅ **Reduce Overruns** - Smart time warnings keep meetings on track - ✅ **Easy Setup** - Works instantly in any Talk room
### 🏆 Perfect For - Team standups and regular check-ins - Project planning sessions - Client meetings with tight schedules - Board meetings requiring structure - Training sessions with timed modules
#### Start having better meetings - Add the Agenda Bot to your Talk rooms and experience the difference!
